attributes.review: i am not gen z i hate gen z but this app took 69 hours to download and then ate my whole family. they’re all gone this app ATE THEM. I am so sad and I really don’t want this to happen to anyone else so please give this app a bad rating for my family. thank you 🙏

attributes.review: the app takes too long to load, logging in is difficult. this app also made all of my other apps crash. whoever made this app I demand a refund for my time. this Cheetohead of a person needs to rethink taking away my favorite app.
attributes.title: gross

attributes.review: I got this app to see updates on the Presidents campaign and it keeps glitching. Not only that but it takes up so much of my storage. This app is useless and a waste of money! Also the close up on his face makes me want to commit arson. Anyways, I would rate this app a 1/10.
attributes.title: Upsetting

attributes.review: Hello💅🏼✨ do I download this app today so i can appreciate our amazing Cheeto 🍊president 🍊🤗 but once I open the app I was in SHOCK 🤯 it was first just a black screen and then it tries to BRAINWASH YOU it kept saying to be a RACIST BIGOT 🤯 then I was exposed to HIS NUDES 😱 I couldn’t believe my eyes 🤭 I had to bleach my eyes SEVERAL TIMES and the image wouldn’t go away 😖DONT GET THIS APP 😰
attributes.title: Wee woo

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support are great president but as I started to look more at the information presented it was both wrong and racist. I know trump is neither of those so why are his policies on his app so bad? It also kept making my phone crash.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review:
To be honest with you, I don't care if you're democrat, republican, independent: TRUMP IS THE WORST PRESIDENT EVER.
For real, he is. He has no policy, has absolutely no clue what he's doing, and is just an idiot. I think my golden retriever is better suited to be president of the United States of America.
So that's all I have to say. Donald Trump stands for himself, not for America.
attributes.title: Worst president in history
